plot outline: A comedy where four bachelor friends come to the city to find livelihood are faced with a problem of finding a home. In their last ditched attempt they deceive a widow landlady by forming a family where one of the friends cross dresses as a lady. Their lies catch up and they have to come out clean.
title: Chitram Bhalare Vichitram
plot: A comedy where four bachelor friends come to the city to find livelihood are faced with a problem of finding a home. In their last ditched attempt they deceive a widow landlady by forming a family where one of the friends cross dresses as a lady. Their lies catch up and they have to come out clean.::krishna nagavolu
